DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , double blind , placebo control study intracoronary cocktail injection combine thrombus aspiration versus thrombus aspiration alone ST-elevation myocardial infarction patient treat primary angioplasty .
DOC.brief_title: Intracoronary Cocktail Injection Combined With Thrombus Aspiration STEMI Patients Treated With Primary Angioplasty
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , double blind , placebo control study intracoronary cocktail injection combine thrombus aspiration versus thrombus aspiration alone ST-elevation myocardial infarction patient treat primary angioplasty . Patients STEMI randomize cocktail group control group . Patients cocktail group receive cocktail injection combine thrombus aspiration . Patients control group receive thrombus aspiration alone . The primary outcome cocktail I study composite death , myocardial infarction class IV heart failure within 1 year . The secondary outcome cocktail I study include slow reflow/no reflow PCI , leave ventricular function , quality life , stroke life-threatening bleeding within 1 year .
DOC.criteria: 1880 year age adult patient STEMI Referred primary PCI within 5d symptom onset Patients undergone previous coronary artery bypass surgery PCI receive fibrinolytic therapy History stroke Active bleed Severe hepatic renal dysfunction Cardiogenic shock Contraindications primary PCI DAPT
